name: Puttenahalli Neighbourhood Lake Improvement Trust

address: Arekere Mico Layout, Off Bannerghatta Road

briefDescription: PNLIT was formed in 2010 in Bangalore by a group of concerned citizens living in the vicinity of the Puttenahalli Lake, Bangalore. One of the main goals of PNLIT is transforming Puttenahalli Lake into a secure habitat for birds and other forms of life, a place of serenity for humans and a source of water regeneration. The trust is currently responsible for the maintenance of the lake, vide an MOU it has signed with the Bruhat Bangalore Mahanagara Palike (BBMP). Apart from the lake, PNLIT is also involved in activities which impact the betterment of the neighbourhood â€“ such as supplementary education of children in need, local problem-solving, waste management, promotion of cloth bags and recycled products, supporting local businesses.
